name: M. R. Industries
overview:
The journey began in year 2006, as a Partnership firm. With the passage of time, M.R. Industries have grown in stature and accomplished many a milestones.

Our Product Range: Plaster Of Paris Products POP Sheets Plaster of Paris Powders Plaster Of Paris Gypsum Products Bag Closing Threads Colored Bag Closing Threads

Our Infrastructure: We operate within a sound infrastructure that includes latest technologies and machinery used to produce highest quality of products. The infrastructure really helps us to deliver the products within the stipulated time frame, and thus helping us to achieve newer and higher standards. The inspiring unit helps to keep the production graph going up.

Vendor Base: We are able to efficiently address the diverse demands and requirements of our valued clients, owing to the long lasting relationship with our vendors. Our vendors provide us immaculate quality products at industry leading prices. We have selected our vendors with utmost care after a detailed market study.

Our Quality Assurance: We have always excelled in quality parameters and have set a benchmark in the industry as per our quality standards. To further educate our people we constantly engage them on certain platforms where in they interact with industry stalwarts and sharpen their base. This not only helps them to work with finesse, at the same time create a healthy image in the mind of clients.

Our Team: The highly skilled professionals, who work with us, adopt a dedicated approach to achieve production excellence. The market experience and industrial knowledge of these professionals has enabled us to target the consumers in right manner and to earn maximum profit. They keep close vigil on even the minor changes taking place in industry and ensure that their plans are further planned accordingly.
